name: Hover Raider RX
overview: Based on an earlier game by Alf Yngve, this revisits the game in 2016 using the new Shoot'em Up Construction Kit Redux engine for smarter play and a better experience. A vertically scrolling shooter, like River Raid on crack with better weaponry. Or as Indie Retro News put it, "River Raid meets Flying Shark". Published in Reset magazine on the #09 Mix-i-Disk.
